title: Shadows of Cathedral Lane: A Detective Sandford Mystery
description: Detective Sergeant Nikki Sandford is having the worst night of her life.Five minutes after the woman of her dreams dumped her in a conversation that will have her questioning her sexuality once again, a man with a serious injury accosts her.One problem: he is already dead. The knife wound in his abdomen and the fact that nobody except Nikki can see him makes that apparent.He wants Nikki to help solve his murder so he can move on to the afterlife, and Nikki is only too happy to oblige if only so that heâ€™ll stop complaining about being stuck in the modern world.But something is trying to stop that from happening.Something that isn't quite human.What secrets lurk in the shadows of Cathedral Lane in Cornwall's only city?Shadows of Cathedral Lane is a dark paranormal mystery spinoff of the author's cosy mystery Salmonweird series.
author: M.G. Mason
